sections.heading: Appeal; civil and criminal actions; procedure; notice of appeal; docketing fee; filing of transcript
sections.text: (1) The proceedings to obtain a reversal, vacation, or modification of judgments and decrees rendered or final orders made by the district court, including judgments and sentences upon convictions fo

sections.heading: must be read in pari material with this section and mandates that when an appellate court grants the State leave to docket an appeal, the State must file a notice of appeal within 30 days in order to perfect jurisdiction in the appellate court
sections.text: State v. Kissell, 13 Neb. App. 209, 690 N.W.2d 194 (200
